INSERT INTO exam_paper_question ( paper_id, question_id, question_order, question_score ) VALUES
(#{epq.paperId}, #{epq.questionId}, #{epq.questionOrder}, #{epq.questionScore})
mapper.select: SELECT q.type, COUNT(*) as question_count, SUM(epq.question_score) as total_score, AVG(epq.question_score) as avg_score FROM exam_paper_question epq INNER JOIN question q ON epq.question_id = q.question_id WHERE epq.paper_id = #{paperId} GROUP BY q.type

SELECT CASE WHEN q.difficulty >= 4.5 THEN '很难' WHEN q.difficulty >= 3.5 THEN '较难' WHEN q.difficulty >= 2.5 THEN '中等' WHEN q.difficulty >= 1.5 THEN '较易' ELSE '简单' END as difficulty_level, COUNT(*) as question_count, SUM(epq.question_score) as total_score FROM exam_paper_question epq INNER JOIN question q ON epq.question_id = q.question_id WHERE epq.paper_id = #{paperId} GROUP BY difficulty_level ORDER BY MIN(q.difficulty)

SELECT q.type, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT q.content) as content_list, COUNT(*) as question_count FROM exam_paper_question epq INNER JOIN question q ON epq.question_id = q.question_id WHERE epq.paper_id = #{paperId} GROUP BY q.type

SELECT q.question_id, q.content, COUNT(*) as usage_count, GROUP_CONCAT(ep.paper_name) as paper_list FROM exam_paper_question epq INNER JOIN question q ON epq.question_id = q.question_id INNER JOIN exam_paper ep ON epq.paper_id = ep.paper_id WHERE q.question_id IN ( SELECT question_id FROM exam_paper_question WHERE paper_id = #{paperId} ) GROUP BY q.question_id, q.content HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_questions, SUM(CASE WHEN q.content IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_content, SUM(CASE WHEN q.answer IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_answer, SUM(CASE WHEN epq.question_score IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_score FROM exam_paper_question epq LEFT JOIN question q ON epq.question_id = q.question_id WHERE epq.paper_id = #{paperId}

SELECT q.question_id, q.content, COUNT(DISTINCT epq.paper_id) as paper_count, COUNT(DISTINCT e.exam_id) as exam_count FROM exam_paper_question epq INNER JOIN question q ON epq.question_id = q.question_id LEFT JOIN exam e ON epq.paper_id = e.paper_id WHERE e.exam_start_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY q.question_id, q.content ORDER BY paper_count DESC, exam_count DESC

WITH question_pairs AS ( SELECT a.question_id as q1_id, b.question_id as q2_id, COUNT(*) as combination_count FROM exam_paper_question a INNER JOIN exam_paper_question b ON a.paper_id = b.paper_id AND a.question_id < b.question_id WHERE a.paper_id = #{paperId} GROUP BY a.question_id, b.question_id ) SELECT q1.content as q1_content, q2.content as q2_content, qp.combination_count FROM question_pairs qp INNER JOIN question q1 ON qp.q1_id = q1.question_id INNER JOIN question q2 ON qp.q2_id = q2.question_id ORDER BY qp.combination_count DESC
